src:
DC Comics Daftarkan Batman di Indonesia untuk Merek Popok Bayi
07 Nov 2019, 18:01 by Andi Saputra
Jakarta - DC Comics dikenal di Indonesia lewat tokoh Batman, Wonder Women, hingga Aquaman. Nama tokoh itu makin dikenal lewat film-film yang kerap menjadi box office. Tapi siapa nyana, DC juga mendaftarkan merek Batman itu untuk merek popok bayi!
Sebagaimana dikutip dari laman website Kemenkumham, Kamis (7/11/2019), DC Comics mendapatkan sertifikat merek itu dengan nomor permohonan DID2019053685. Merek ini untuk kategori celana pelatihan sekali pakai, popok bayi, popok dewasa, popok tekstil, popok untuk hewan peliharaan.
DC Comics, yang beralamat di 2900 West Alameda, Burbank, California 91505, memberikan kuasa kepada Prudence Jahja, yang beralamat di Menara Batavia lantai 19, Jalan KH Mas Mansyur Kaveling 126, Jakarta Pusat.
Sebelumnya, DC Comics sempat kalah melawan merek wafer Superman yang dibuat oleh PT Marxing Fam Makmur. DC Comics meminta PN Jakpus menyatakan diri sebagai pemilik merek-merek Superman dan mempunyai hak eksklusif terhadap merek-merek tersebut di wilayah Indonesia.
Selain itu, DC meminta agar merek yang dimiliki PT Marxing Fam Makmur dibatalkan dengan segala akibat hukumnya.
Namun apa daya, DC Comics tak berdaya. Pada 13 April 2018, PN Jakpus memutuskan gugatan Penggugat tidak dapat diterima (niet on vanklicht verklaard). Putusan itu dikuatkan MA.
"Gugatan Penggugat (DC Comics) merupakan gabungan/kumulasi dari pembatalan merek Superman atas nama Tergugat dan pencoretan permintaan pendaftaran merek-merek Superman atas nama Tergugat yang sedang dimintakan pendaftarannya pada Turut Tergugat (Ditjen Kekayaan Intelektual Kemenkum HAM, red), yang bertujuan agar merek-merek Superman atas nama Penggugat yang didaftarkan dapat dikabulkan dan diterbitkan, sehingga gugatan seperti ini adalah gugatan yang kabur dan tidak jelas," putus majelis kasasi.

(asp/rvk)
text:
DC Comics Lists Batman in Indonesia for Baby Diaper Brands
Nov 7 2019, 18:01 by Andi Saputra
Jakarta - DC Comics is well known in Indonesia through Batman, Wonder Women, and Aquaman. The character's name is increasingly known through films that often become the box office. But who would have thought, DC also registered the Batman brand for the baby diaper brand!
As quoted from the website of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, Thursday (11/07/2019), DC Comics received the brand certificate with the application number DID2019053685. This brand is for the category of disposable training pants, baby diapers, adult diapers, textile diapers, pet diapers.
DC Comics, having its address at 2900 West Alameda, Burbank, California 91505, grants power to Prudence Jahja, having his address at Menara Batavia, 19th floor, Jalan KH Mas Mansyur Kaveling 126, Central Jakarta.
Previously, DC Comics lost to the Superman wafer brand made by PT Marxing Fam Makmur. DC Comics asked PN Jakpus to declare itself to be the owner of Superman brands and have exclusive rights to these brands in Indonesian territory.
In addition, DC requested that the brand owned by PT Marxing Fam Makmur be canceled with all legal consequences.
But alas, DC Comics is helpless. On April 13, 2018, the Central Jakarta District Court decided that the Plaintiff's claim could not be accepted (niet on vanklicht verklaard). The verdict was corroborated by the Supreme Court.
"The Plaintiffs Lawsuit (DC Comics) is a combination / cumulation of the cancellation of the Superman trademark on behalf of the Defendant and deleting requests for registration of Superman marks on behalf of the Defendant who is being requested for registration at the Defendant (Directorate General of Intellectual Property of the Ministry of Law and Human Rights, red), which aims to mark the trademark registration of Superman on behalf of the Defendant who is being asked to register at the Defendant (Directorate General of Intellectual Property Ministry of Law and Human Rights, red). -The Superman brand on behalf of the Plaintiff registered can be granted and published, so a lawsuit like this is a vague and obscure lawsuit, "the cassation panel decided.

(asp / rvk)
